author: rdonkin
msg: War is not being signed, probably due to project type being pom. Comment out war release for the moment.

author: jbunting
msg: SHIRO-283: adding ability to specify "permissive" for authc and authcBasic filters.  This will cause unauthenticated users to not be blocked, but will perform appropriate login request (redirect or challenge response) when an UnauthenticatedException is thrown.
